projectGridLines.title: The scope of the internship will include:
projectGridLines.description:
The scope of the internship will include:

1. Summarize and prepare visual slides which articulate all of the software elements we are building/have built at Distinkt (Output: PowerPoint slides).

2. Ideate and design data handling and storage â€“ Design and build the data pipelines and storage (things like schemas, APIs to call and retrieve data from the databases, etc.) (Output: data pipeline)

3. Software MVP- Build a minimally functional SaaS for sales demos (no back end required) (Output: SaaS wireframes)

*Additional responsibilities may be identified as the internship progresses.

**Required Tools: Canva, Figma, Miro, Asana, PowerPoint, Notion, Slack
